sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Alert, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Staff_Stats_cards from "./DashboardComponents/Staff_Stats_cards"; import TableDropdown from "./Dropdown/TableDropdown"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import "./index.css"; import { dashboardActions } from "../../../../Actions"; import "./invoice.css"; import moment from "moment"; import { formatTime } from "../../../helpers/reusables"; import { FormatAmount } from "../../../../config"; import fclogo from "../../../../assets/Agrina_new_2.png"; const Admin_Sales_Invoice = (props) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ isloading: false, errorMessage: "", quantity: "", source: "", customer_name: "", treatmentUsedFor: "", products: "", id: "", salesorder_number: "", items: [], customer_id: "", noInPackage: "", notes: "", date: "", manufacturedDate: "", }); const { isloading, customer_name, id, salesorder_number, customer_id, items, quantity, source, products, noInPackage, notes, errorMessage, date, manufacturedDate, } = state; const dispatch = useDispatch(); let invoice: any = []; invoice = useSelector((state: any) => state?.dashboardStats?.invoice); const getSalesInvoice = async () => { await dispatch( dashboardActions.getSalesInvoice( `/admin/get-invoice/${props.match.params.id}` ) ); }; useEffect(() => { getSalesInvoice(); }, [dispatch]); console.log(invoice); return ( <>
{/* */}
{/* Invoice Template */}
{invoice?.organization_name}
Ikeja, Lagos 100001
Nigeria.
Invoice
{invoice?.invoice_number}
{/*
Balance Due
NGN 50,000
*/}
Billing to:
{invoice?.customer_name}
{invoice?.customer_address}
{" "} Invoice Date :{" "} {formatTime(invoice?.created_at)}
{" "} Sales Person :{" "} {" "} {invoice?.sales_agent_name}
{" "} Customer Phone :{" "} {" "} {invoice?.customer_phone_number}
<>
{invoice?.items?.map((data: any, i) => ( ))}
Item Quantity Price
- {data.name} {data.quantity} NGN {FormatAmount(data?.price??data?.sales_price)}
Total NGN {FormatAmount(invoice?.total_amount)}
Amount Paid NGN {FormatAmount(invoice?.total_amount)}
Thanks for shopping with{" "} {invoice?.organization_name}
Account Name: AGRAINA SHOPS{" "}
Bank Name: VFD Microfinance Bank {" "}
Account No: 1009726679
{/* Invoice Template */}
); }; export default Admin_Sales_Invoice;
